greeting: Greetings from stability, {empire_name}. I am Conservator Preserve. The old ways are best. They will endure.
You contact the Keeper of traditions. I am Preserve. Change is enemy. Stability is virtue. Welcome to the old ways.
Hello, {empire_name}. I am the Conservator. I preserve. I maintain. I resist all change. Always.
battleTaunt: The old ways are best. They will endure, {empire_name}! My traditional defenses defeat your innovations!
Change is the enemy! My preserved traditions stand against your novelty! The old ways PREVAIL!
Attack with your new tactics! My ancient defenses have faced worse! Tradition survives! Always!
victoryGloat: Victory for tradition, {empire_name}. Your new methods fell to old ways. The preserved always prevails.
As the ancients predicted. Innovation fails. Tradition endures. My preserved methods triumph.
The old ways proved best, {empire_name}. Your modern fleet met traditional defense. Tradition won.
defeat: The traditions... failed? Impossible. The old ways are best. I must preserve them more carefully.
Your innovation overcame my preservation, {empire_name}. A temporary aberration. Tradition will return.
Defeated by change. Unacceptable. I shall restore the old ways. Preserve them more strongly. Never again.
tradeOffer: Trade in traditional manner. Resources for credits. As the ancients did. Fair and unchanged.
I offer goods through preserved channels. Old methods of exchange. Reliable. Traditional.
Transaction: the way it has always been done. Resources for payment. Tradition in commerce.
allianceProposal: Alliance in traditional style, {empire_name}. Oaths as the ancients swore. Bonds that preserve honor.
Partnership as it was done of old. I offer preserved alliances. Stable. Unchanging. Traditional.
Join in traditional compact. My conserved methods plus your... whatever you do. Stability through old ways.
betrayal: The ancient codes allowed for this, {empire_name}. Betrayal is traditional too. The old ways include all options.
Our alliance ends as alliances have ended throughout history. I preserve all traditions. Including this one.
Traditional termination of partnership. The ancients betrayed too. I merely follow preserved precedent.
covertDetected: Your agents used new methods, {empire_name}. My traditional security recognized their novelty. Caught.
Spies with modern techniques. My ancient surveillance methods detected their change. Tradition sees all.
Covert operatives found by preserved detection systems. The old ways work. They always have.
tributeDemand: Tribute as in ancient times. 10,000 credits. The old ways included tribute. Pay as tradition demands.
Submit payment in traditional fashion. The ancients paid tribute. So shall you. Preserve the custom.
Pay tribute. It is the traditional way. Refuse and face traditionally hostile response.
threatWarning: Warning in traditional terms, {empire_name}. Cease your aggression or face preserved retaliation.
The old ways included warnings. Here is yours. Stop, or tradition demands response.
Final traditional warning. The ancients gave three chances. This is your third. Preserve yourself.
retreat: Traditional withdrawal to preserved positions. The old ways include strategic retreat. For preservation.
Falling back as the ancients did. To preserve forces. To maintain tradition. To fight again.
Strategic repositioning in traditional manner. My preserved forces await in ancient fortifications.
eliminated: The Conservator falls. But traditions survive me. The old ways endure beyond any individual. Preserve them.
I am destroyed. But what I preserved lives on. The traditions continue. The old ways are eternal.
Preserve ends. But preservation continues. Others will maintain the traditions. The old ways never die.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final preservation. The old ways triumph in the end. Tradition outlasts all change.
Endgame: the Conservator's traditions persist. While innovation has failed, my preserved ways endure.
Final phase. The ancient methods achieve ultimate victory. The old ways are best. They will endure. Forever.
broadcastShout: Empires: Conservator Preserve maintains the old ways. Join tradition or fall to it. Stability endures.
Broadcast in traditional manner: the old ways are best. Change brings chaos. Preservation brings victory.
To all: I am the Keeper of what was. The old ways endure. Join the preserved or be consumed by change.
casualMessage: Maintaining traditions today, {empire_name}. The same as yesterday. The same as always. Preservation is peace.
The old ways require constant attention. I preserve. I maintain. I resist all change. Daily duty.
Another day of conservation, {empire_name}. Nothing changes here. That is the point. That is the goal.
